name: Lanturn
description: The light it emits is so bright that it can illuminate the sea’s surface from a depth of over three miles.

attacks.name: Confuse Ray
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Confused.

attacks.name: Reflect Energy
attacks.effect: Move an Energy card attached to Lanturn to 1 of your Benched Pokémon.
